title: Anivia skin ( Firedrake Anivia )
body: I created an {{champion:34}} skin but only a textversion of it on paint ( i dont have an other program xD {{item:3070}} ) and want to ask you how you think about it. maybe u like the way i think, if yes pls try to make my idea as a artwork, and then maybe riot will release it to the game ;) . {{summoner:14}} {{champion:34}} {{summoner:30}}
